FuncDef:
The ppp chap user command configures a local user name.
The undo ppp chap user command deletes a local user name.
By default, local user name is Huawei.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a local user name configured for the peer.
The value is a string of 1 to 253 characters.

ExtraInfo: To configure a local user name for CHAP authentication during PPP negotiation, run the ppp chap user command.
